name: Get Your Ducks In A Row (nemecek)
name_original: Get Your Ducks In A Row (nemecek)
description:
Fight against waves of aquatic enemies by summoning Ducks through cards and managing resources. Keep your Core alive!

A silly game made by: Amy, Anita, Felipe, Frankie, Jason, Juan, Ryan, Scott, Thiago and Zixia.

Submitted as an entry for the 2022 Game Off Jam.

Special thanks to Marino, for being our inspiration.

Special apologies to Marino, for being our inspiration.
